title: Since new patches , iam playing in 20 fps.
body: Since the new patches , i am having lag. I always played with 50-60 fps and i was too fine , now drop fps , when i open lol client and when i want to play my cpu memory usage is 100% , i dont have problem with it in my computer , but only when i open lol , riot , please make this game more easier (i mean no fps drop) we all wanna play it but this new legacy patch broked us (sorry for bad english) please do something , 20 fps always with the new patch.

replies.body: Whelp, it's definitely not good that League seems to be eating up 100% of your cpu memory when it's running. It really sounds like your pc is having a hard time running League now for some reason, so let's be sure to go through all the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the most common performance issue fixes.
I will follow these steps , but do you want screenshoot to see my pc's cpu while i play lol :)? tomorrow when ill start a game to play ill send it to you , thanks ;).

Hey if that doesn't seem to help send us all the screenshots you can think of! Any information we can see can help us narrow down what's really going on.

Also! Make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game just in case they don't fix it ^_^!
